title: Lemon chicken leafy salad
ingredients: ['120g low fat mayonnaise', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '2 tablespoons chopped chives', '1 tablespoon chopped mint', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 (370g) roasted chicken breasts, skinned and torn into strips', '1 (280g) whole Romaine lettuce', '1 (85g) bag watercress', '2 to 3 tablespoons French dressing']
